text: Beyonce Recreates Deepika Padukone’s Iconic Cannes' Look & We Can’t Decide Who Pulled It Off Better
title: Beyonce Recreates Deepika Padukone’s Iconic Look From Cannes & We Can’t Decide Who Pulled It Off Better
description: Queen Bey AKA Beyonce, who is busy promoting her recent album Everything Is Love, just recreated Deepika Padukone's look at Global Citizen Festival in South Africa. Deepika's stylist Shaleena Nathani has also confirmed that she wore the same outfit in her Instagram story. "Hell Yes !!!", she wrote along with it.
